name: Mercury
description: The smallest planet in our solar system and the closest one to the Sun. Its proximity to the Sun causes extreme temperature swings.

name: Venus
description: Venus is the second planet from the Sun. It is the hottest planet in our solar system, with a thick, toxic atmosphere.

name: Earth
description: Our home planet, Earth is the only known celestial body to harbor life. Its protective atmosphere and vast oceans make it a unique haven in the universe.

name: Mars
description: Known as the Red Planet, Mars is a cold, desert-like world. Its distinctive color comes from iron minerals in its soil.

name: Jupiter
description: The largest planet in our solar system, Jupiter is a gas giant with a swirling atmosphere of hydrogen and helium.

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun and is famous for its stunning, intricate ring system made of ice and rock particles.

name: Uranus
description: An ice giant with a unique sideways rotation, Uranus is a cold and windy world with a blue-green atmosphere.

name: Neptune
description: The most distant planet, Neptune is a dark, cold, and extremely windy world. It is also an ice giant, similar to Uranus.
